original_text: Then she arose with her daughters-in-law to return from the country of Moab, for she had heard in the fields of Moab that the Lord had visited his people and given them food.
korean_text: 그 여인이 모압 지방에서 여호와께서 자기 백성을 돌보시사 그들에게 양식을 주셨다 함을 듣고 이에 두 며느리와 함께 일어나 모압 지방에서 돌아오려 하여

sentences.original_text: Then she arose with her daughters-in-law
to return from the country of Moab,
for she had heard in the fields of Moab
that the Lord had visited his people

sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 음식을 주셨다는 소식을 들었기 때문입니다
